TopicTitle: Why is the squad monkey so damn happy?

Articles.Content:
Is it because he knows how many mods I have and I won't load before 20 minutes is up?

Did he just release a really eggy fart?

Did he just find out he is a father?

All these questions...

what is the answer?
He saw his family for the first time in 4 years after coming back from the war of the Kerbals.
Because we test our rockets with Kerbals instead of chimpanzees.
Because he is the evolution of Kerbals!
Because he needed to take a crap and it went perfect

Chimps are pretty easily amused, he just stole a helmet

Edited April 27, 2013 by ramses
He defeated the ker-proximans (from ker-proxima Centauri) after they attacked Kerbin and tried to take it over
Sold a lot of KSP licences so he can by an truckload of bananas.
Maybe he just noticed how his friend ham had survived reentry.

I wondered instead: why the hell a chimp should wear a GENERAL'S RANK!!! Did he attended Kest Point? Who the hell gave him that rank!!!

I'm joking, maybe that's intended as a pun (military officers=laughing chimp), maybe not, maybe squad staff liked that IIWW style rank and included it for no reason.
Because he's cool that way, that's why.
Because he knows that he represents the people who created the awesomeness that is KSP!
